hero.title: Puttfun Barcelona
hero.subtitle: The Reimagination of Minigolf
hero.description: 18 holes of fun with modern theming, neon lights, creative obstacles and cutting-edge technology

about.title: Why a Minigolf?
about.story: I recently traveled to other cities in Spain and enjoyed minigolf with friends and family. When I returned to Barcelona there wasn't one... How can it be that the second most important city in Spain doesn't have one?
about.visionText: Reimagining minigolf, combining technology and creative holes for a refreshing and fun experience for all ages.

feature1.title: 18 Creative Holes
feature1.description: Each hole is a unique adventure with innovative and challenging obstacles

feature2.title: Neon Lights
feature2.description: Vibrant atmosphere with LED lighting and spectacular visual effects

feature3.title: Integrated Technology
feature3.description: Digital scoring system and interactive effects on every hole

feature4.title: For All Ages
feature4.description: Guaranteed fun for families, friends and corporate events
